summary: This is an email chain from October 3, 2019, between FBI Victim Specialists discussing assistance for a victim of the Jeffrey Epstein case. The correspondence involves coordinating travel and attendance for the victim at a victims' briefing in New York on October 23, 2019, and mentions the involvement of the victim's attorney and a case agent.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the subject of the case for which victim assistance is being coordinated.

events.title: Victim Services Briefing in New York
events.description: The Victim Services Division is hosting a briefing for victims of the Jeffrey Epstein case in New York.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was actively working with victims of the Jeffrey Epstein case as of October 2019.
A victim's attorney contacted the FBI regarding the victim's attendance and travel assistance for a briefing in New York.
A victims' briefing was scheduled for October 23, 2019, in New York.
The email indicates coordination between FBI Victim Specialists in different offices to assist a victim.
The document shows the operational process of the FBI's Victim Services Division in responding to the Epstein case.
